scenario_text.value: No... I don’t think Aoi came here.

There’s something else, though. I wanted to
go to the mountain up ahead, but look...

Yeah, there’s no going any further with all
that fog.

It’s strange. Up until just a little while
ago it hadn’t spread this far.
You think it’s starting to move faster?
The Master must be behind this somehow.

That seems pretty likely. But why this sudden
change?

What was that?! Did you see some sort of
shadow just now?

Over in that patch of grass! See it? That
could be Aoi!
Miu, no! That’s not Aoi, that’s an enemy!
